channel.title: Need help with magic's! magic's do not freeze player! source pi! please help!
channel.description: tittle says all. my magic's do not freeze players in my 317 pi source. any help is appreicated. im pretty sure the problem is in combatassistant.java. but don't know where.

item.title: Need help with magic's! magic's do not freeze player! source pi! please help!
item.dc:creator: @Virgin Virgin
item.description:
@Virgin wrote:

First thing I came across, mine works perfectly so here:

if(magicFailed) { Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].gfx100(85); } if(!magicFailed) { int freezeDelay = getFreezeTime();//freeze if(freezeDelay > 0 && Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].freezeTimer == 0) { Server.npcHandler.npcs[i].freezeTimer = freezeDelay; }
Hope this helped. All I did was type “freeze” and gave you the first code snippet. Now please help me with the dicebag?(=
